citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:40 pm to 3:10 pm
on 27-DEC-23.
Upon arrival at the facility I knocked and honked my horn. I then waited for thirty minutes and departed the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:40 pm to 3:10 pm 
on 27-DEC-23. 
 
Upon arrival at the facility I knocked and honked my horn. I then waited for thirty minutes and departed the facility. 
 
 
End Section
